attributes.action: make BBC3 show a Neighbours omnibus on the weekend as a condition of the licence fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As licence fee payers, we deserve the right to more Neighbours! 
As someone who works 9-5 on weekdays, it's rare for me to be able to watch Neighbours every day on account of the traffic. That means that I, and many others I have spoken to, miss Neighbours and wish it could be shown on a day we don't work. 
I feel that it is in the public interest for the BBC to show a Neighbours omnibus for people who want to stay in touch with Erinsborough.
Come on Tony and Gordon, speak to Mark Thompson and make your people smile.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
